title: NBA Legend Alonzo Mourning’s Journey From Kidney Scare To Health Advocate
description: With an NBA championship ring, 7 All-Star appearances and an Olympic gold medal, Alonzo Mourning was on top of the world. Until he wasn't. The NBA legend is using his powerful platform to educate the public about kidney health, after his own battle with a rare renal disease.
